name: zig_colored_logger
description: Simple colored logger for the std.log.LogFn
readme: # zig_colored_logger Simple colored logger for the std.log.LogFn ## Usage To add the project in your `build.zig.zon`: `zig fetch --save git+https://github.com/4zv4l/zig_colored_logger` Then and this in `build.zig`: ```rs const colored_logger = b.dependency("colored_logger", .{ .project_name = exe.name }); exe.root_module.addImport("colored_logger", colored_logger.module("colored_logger")); ``` > This library depends on Chameleon https://github.com/tr1ckydev/chameleon ## How it looks like

releases.name: Colored Logger 1.0
releases.body: First release, I've tested it in my zfs project (a very basic file server) and so far it doesn't look too bad.
